entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few clouds. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
